name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, by its Secretary, Gordon K. MacLeod, M.D. v. Peter T. DeMARCO, M.D., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth, Department of Health v. DeMarco

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, by its Secretary, Gordon K. MacLeod, M.D. v. Peter T. DeMARCO, M.D., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Carl G. Roberts, Robert W. Maris, Carl P. Casey, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John G. Knorr, III, Deputy Atty. Gen., for Dept, of Health.
Joseph J. Carlin, Philadelphia, for S.O.S. Assoc.
casebody.head_matter:
459 A.2d 756
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH, by its Secretary, Gordon K. MacLeod, M.D. v. Peter T. DeMARCO, M.D., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 26, 1983.
Decided May 10, 1983.
Carl G. Roberts, Robert W. Maris, Carl P. Casey, Philadelphia, for appellant.
John G. Knorr, III, Deputy Atty. Gen., for Dept, of Health.
Joseph J. Carlin, Philadelphia, for S.O.S. Assoc.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
